name: BALL ADVENTURE (Demon studio)
description:
This is a fun adventure game making by demon studio .This is a free game you can play this .there you have 2 modes story mode,endless mode 

Story mode:you have to survive from zombie be active there are hidden traps also.

Story mode is a big mode so this will come in update for game only endless mode is come 

Endless mode:In this mod you have to fight from enemy the enemy spawn every 10 second,when enemy kill it drop a coin when you take the coin your score will increase

Game was release soonly
